net.sf.javaml.filter

Interface DatasetFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFilter, ClassRemoveFilter, ClassReplaceFilter, ClassRetainFilter, EqualWidthBinning, FourBinMinimalEntropyPartitioning, InstanceNormalizeMidrange, KNearestNeighbors, MissingClassFilter, NormalizeMean, NormalizeMeanIQR135, NormalizeMidrange, RecursiveMinimalEntropyPartitioning, RemoveMissingValue, ReplaceWithValue, RetainAttributes, ThreeBinMinimalEntropyPartitioning, TwoBinMinimalEntropyPartitioning, UnsetClassFilter

    public interface DatasetFilter
    The interface for filters that can be applied on an Dataset. When applying a filter to a data set it may modify the instances in the data set, and can alter the content of the data set.
    Version:
    0.1.7
    Author:
    Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)
    See Also:
    Instance, Dataset

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void build(Dataset data)
      This method can be used if the filter needs some training first
      void filter(Dataset data)
      Applies this filter to an dataset and return the modified dataset.

    • Method Detail

      • build

        void build(Dataset data)
        This method can be used if the filter needs some training first
        Parameters:
        data - the data used for training.

      • filter

        void filter(Dataset data)
        Applies this filter to an dataset and return the modified dataset.
        Parameters:
        data - the dataset to apply this filter to
